metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17563 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain host OS privileges by leveraging an incorrect mask for reference-count overflow checking in shadow mode.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
